summary: Web application with admin dashboard requiring authentication
architectural_notes: Admin dashboard accessible on separate URL/route

existing_features.title: Create an admin login page at /admin/login with username and password input fields
Protect the /admin route to require authentication before displaying the admin dashboard
Remove or hide the admin navigation link from the Header component for non-authenticated admin users

new_feature_requests.summary: Add username and password authentication to admin dashboard
Create a backend authentication system with username and password validation for admin access
